Kuo prof-kuo-2016-apr-1-seminar-poster.pdf 19 September, 2013 Added "Seminar Camp" information. 24 June, 2013 Special Lecture by Professor Kung Yao 11-30 June, 2013 Distinguished Professor Kung Yao visited our laboratory. 11 June, 2013 New Academic Papers were added. 7 May, 2013 We have now our Facebook page. 18 April, 2013 Three Bachelor course students (Mr.Ootsuka, Mr.Okada, Mr.Hasegawa) joined our laboratory. 11 April, 2013 Our official web site was renovated. 1 April, 2013 One research student (Mr.Kameyama), six master course students (Mr.Ookubo, Mr.Shimizu, Mr.Naohara, Mr.Nagasaki, Ms.Li, Mr.Moriyama) and one doctor course student (Mr.Ogawa) joined our laboratory. 18 April, 2012 Three undergraduate students joined our laboratory (Mr.Kameyama, Mr.Inohara, and Mr.Nagasaki). 1 April, 2012 Three master course students joined our laboratory (Mr.Arii, Mr.Kuse, and Mr.Irie). 1 April, 2012 Dr. Ken UMENO was appointed as a professor at Kyoto University Graduate School of Informatics.
